snippet: COSGROVE--Margaret L. Margaret L. Cosgrove, known to her Manhattan neighbors for her extraordinary acts of kindness, generous philanthropy, tree planting and animal rescues, passed away peacefully in her New York home on December 15, 2015. She was 91. Full obituary at: www.jasinfuneralhome.com 1/3
